TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ProtocolReflector extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供跨通訊協定 (Protocol) 的通用功能，用於從識別為 Web 服務的類別建立 物件。

span.span: Provides common functionality across communication protocols for creating objects from classes that are identified as Web services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 抽象類別和衍生的類別會建立其具體物件會識別為與 Web 服務的類別從屬性。The abstract class and its concrete derived classes create objects from classes that are identified as Web services with the attribute. 每個具體-在衍生的類別產生物件根據指定的通訊協定;提供通用的功能，不論通訊協定。Each concrete -derived class generates objects according to a specified communication protocol; provides common functionality regardless of the protocol. 輸出執行個體可以用來產生 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 文件與方法或其中一個可用的多載。An output instance can be used to generate a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document with the method or one of the available overloads. 也可以藉由使用執行個體類別和相關的類別，來產生用戶端 proxy 程式碼，或是擷取伺服器程式碼。The instance can also be used by the class and related classes to generate client proxy code or abstract server code. 類別會使用建立對於每個繫結的 Web 服務類別識別。The class uses the to create a for each binding it identifies in the Web service class. 如果該屬性不存在，類別會建立整個類別的單一繫結。If that attribute is not present, the class creates a single binding for the entire class. 每個 Web 服務方法 (使用出現在 Web 服務類別的方法) 屬於繫結，類別衍生自會產生作業和相關聯的訊息新增至物件。For each Web service method (a method in the Web service class appearing with the ) belonging to a binding, a class derived from generates an operation and associated messages that are added to the object. 一般而言，開發人員會使用間接透過這些類別類別，而不是直接叫用類別衍生自。Typically, a developer uses these classes indirectly through the class, instead of directly invoking classes derived from .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription GetServiceDescription(string ns) cil managed
Public Function GetServiceDescription (ns As String) As ServiceDescription

param.name: ns
param.span: 隨後獲得的 執行個體會填入物件，這些物件對應至從輸入 Web 服務類別反映的 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 實體。

span.span: The instance obtained subsequently gets populated with objects that correspond to Web Services Description Language (WSDL) entities that are reflected from the input Web service class.

summary.span: 取得 物件，用於指定的 XML 命名空間和適用的通訊協定。

returns.span: 物件，用於指定的 XML 命名空間和適用的通訊協定。

span.span: A object for a given XML namespace and the applicable communication protocol.
